title: fullnode-scraper
blurb: Bitcoin fullnode IP/endpoint discovery and analytics pipeline: DNS seeds → P2P gossip → optional targeted probes, enriched with ASN/Geo, versions, and service flags.
description: fullnode-scraper maintains a fresh catalog of reachable Bitcoin peers for research and operations. It starts with DNS seeds, then follows P2P addr/addrv2 gossip and (optionally) limited, rate-capped targeted probes. For each observed endpoint, it records protocol traits (UA, version, services), timing (first/last seen, handshake latency), and enrichment (ASN, GeoIP, rDNS). Output is normalized to SQLite for quick queries and Parquet/CSV for analytics, with signed manifests for reproducibility. Tor/I2P routing and ethical guardrails are built-in.
